sourcesContent:
export const translations = {
  header: {
    title: "Glowria",
    tagline: "Your journey to radiant skin and beautiful hair"
  },
  nav: {
    home: "Home",
    products: "Products",
    about: "About",
    contact: "Contact",
    login: "Login",
    register: "Register"
  },
  categories: {
    all: "All",
    skincare: "Skincare",
    haircare: "Haircare"
  },
  product: {
    addToCart: "Add to Cart"
  },
  home: {
    heroTitle: "Welcome to Amira Beauty",
    heroSubtitle: "Discover premium skincare and haircare products designed to enhance your natural beauty. Your journey to radiant skin and beautiful hair starts here.",
    ctaButton: "Shop Now",
    featuresTitle: "Why Choose Us",
    feature1Title: "Premium Quality",
    feature1Desc: "We use only the finest ingredients sourced from nature to create products that truly work.",
    feature2Title: "Natural Ingredients",
    feature2Desc: "Our products are made with natural, organic ingredients that are gentle on your skin and hair.",
    feature3Title: "Expert Care",
    feature3Desc: "Every product is carefully formulated by beauty experts to deliver the best results."
  },
  products: {
    title: "Our Products",
    subtitle: "Explore our collection of premium skincare and haircare products"
  },
  about: {
    title: "About Amira Beauty",
    subtitle: "Your trusted partner in beauty and wellness",
    missionTitle: "Our Mission",
    missionText: "To empower every woman to feel confident and beautiful in her own skin by providing high-quality, natural beauty products.",
    valuesTitle: "Our Values",
    valuesText: "We believe in transparency, quality, and sustainability. Every product we create reflects our commitment to your beauty and well-being.",
    qualityTitle: "Quality Promise",
    qualityText: "We never compromise on quality. Each product undergoes rigorous testing to ensure it meets our high standards.",
    storyTitle: "Our Story",
    storyText: "Amira Beauty was founded with a simple vision: to make premium beauty products accessible to everyone. We combine traditional wisdom with modern science to create products that truly make a difference in your beauty routine."
  },
  contact: {
    title: "Get in Touch",
    subtitle: "We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.",
    emailTitle: "Email",
    phoneTitle: "Phone",
    addressTitle: "Address",
    addressText: "123 Beauty Street, City, Country 12345",
    nameLabel: "Name",
    emailLabel: "Email",
    messageLabel: "Message",
    submitButton: "Send Message",
    successMessage: "Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you soon."
  },
  login: {
    title: "Welcome Back",
    subtitle: "Sign in to your account to continue",
    emailLabel: "Email Address",
    emailPlaceholder: "Enter your email",
    passwordLabel: "Password",
    passwordPlaceholder: "Enter your password",
    rememberMe: "Remember me",
    forgotPassword: "Forgot password?",
    submitButton: "Sign In",
    loading: "Signing in...",
    noAccount: "Don't have an account?",
    registerLink: "Sign up",
    errorRequired: "Please fill in all fields",
    errorLogin: "Invalid email or password",
    successMessage: "Login successful! Welcome back."
  },
  register: {
    title: "Create Account",
    subtitle: "Join us and start your beauty journey",
    nameLabel: "Full Name",
    namePlaceholder: "Enter your full name",
    emailLabel: "Email Address",
    emailPlaceholder: "Enter your email",
    phoneNumberLabel: "Phone Number",
    phoneNumberPlaceholder: "Enter your phone number",
    addressLabel: "Address",
    addressPlaceholder: "Enter your address",
    passwordLabel: "Password",
    passwordPlaceholder: "Create a password",
    confirmPasswordLabel: "Confirm Password",
    confirmPasswordPlaceholder: "Confirm your password",
    agreeTerms: "I agree to the Terms and Conditions",
    submitButton: "Create Account",
    loading: "Creating account...",
    haveAccount: "Already have an account?",
    loginLink: "Sign in",
    errorRequired: "Please fill in all fields",
    errorPasswordMatch: "Passwords do not match",
    errorPasswordLength: "Password must be at least 6 characters",
    errorRegister: "Registration failed. Please try again.",
    successMessage: "Registration successful! Please login."
  },
  footer: {
    rights: "© 2024 Amira Beauty. All rights reserved."
  }
};

export const productTranslations = {
  en: [
    {
      id: 1,
      name: "Glowing Face Serum",
      description: "Vitamin C enriched serum that brightens your skin and reduces dark spots. Perfect for daily use to achieve that natural glow.",
      category: "skincare"
    },
    {
      id: 2,
      name: "Hydrating Face Cream",
      description: "Deeply moisturizing cream with hyaluronic acid. Keeps your skin soft, supple, and hydrated all day long.",
      category: "skincare"
    },
    {
      id: 3,
      name: "Gentle Cleansing Foam",
      description: "Soft, foaming cleanser that removes impurities without stripping your skin's natural moisture. Suitable for all skin types.",
      category: "skincare"
    },
    {
      id: 4,
      name: "Anti-Aging Night Cream",
      description: "Rich night cream with retinol and peptides. Works while you sleep to reduce fine lines and improve skin texture.",
      category: "skincare"
    },
    {
      id: 5,
      name: "Brightening Face Mask",
      description: "Weekly treatment mask with natural fruit extracts. Instantly brightens and refreshes your complexion.",
      category: "skincare"
    },
    {
      id: 6,
      name: "SPF 50 Sunscreen",
      description: "Lightweight, non-greasy sunscreen that protects your skin from harmful UV rays. Perfect for everyday use.",
      category: "skincare"
    },
    {
      id: 7,
      name: "Nourishing Shampoo",
      description: "Sulfate-free shampoo enriched with argan oil. Cleanses gently while adding shine and softness to your hair.",
      category: "haircare"
    },
    {
      id: 8,
      name: "Deep Conditioner",
      description: "Intensive conditioning treatment that repairs damaged hair and restores moisture. Leaves hair silky smooth.",
      category: "haircare"
    },
    {
      id: 9,
      name: "Hair Growth Serum",
      description: "Powerful serum with biotin and keratin. Stimulates hair growth and strengthens hair follicles for thicker, healthier hair.",
      category: "haircare"
    },
    {
      id: 10,
      name: "Heat Protection Spray",
      description: "Protects your hair from heat damage up to 450°F. Essential before using any hot styling tools.",
      category: "haircare"
    },
    {
      id: 11,
      name: "Volumizing Mousse",
      description: "Lightweight mousse that adds volume and body to fine or flat hair. Creates long-lasting, natural-looking lift.",
      category: "haircare"
    },
    {
      id: 12,
      name: "Hair Oil Treatment",
      description: "Multi-purpose hair oil with coconut and jojoba. Tames frizz, adds shine, and nourishes from root to tip.",
      category: "haircare"
    }
  ]
};
